relation: Perfection. (No discernable flaws; one of the reviewer's all-time favorites)
Near Perfection. (An instant classic with some minor imperfections)
Excellent. (An excellent effort worth picking up)
Good. (A good effort, worth checking out or picking up)
Decent. (A decent effort worth checking out if the style fits your tastes)
Average. (Nothing special; worth checking out if the style fits your taste)
Fair. (There is better metal out there)
